amendment.description: To improve provisions relating to appropriations for the Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2564 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2564 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5817, S5818; text: CR S5817) To improve provisions relating to appropriations for the Corps of Engineers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2564 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2137.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2564 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
